title: casabitcoin
author: casabitcoin
created_time: December 24, 2022, 06:21:42 PMLast edit: December 25, 2022, 03:16:46 AM by casabitcoin
content: LIVE Christmas Gambling Stream with DiceBot and Free Script! Another year has already gone by and we're doing another Christmas LIVE stream! The stream is of me gambling on a website using a bot and script. Here's the stream link: https://odysee.com/@cryptogambling:0/livecryptogamblingscripts:1Here's a direct link to the free script used in the stream,https://pastebin.com/5MsSgYDXMy basic strat when using this script:Keep the balance about the same, slowing ramping up, depositing profits to vault. (we started with 1, now ramped up to balance of 2)When bust, change seeds and take out, 1.5x the last starting balance you had from vault. Continue until you are in the green again and then deposit profits again, to the vault. Let me know if you have any questions. Cheers and good luck!Johnny

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I thought this some something else like a christmas bonus. Are you giving out a script for free to use in gambling?. Why not post the whole information in here as for many people to understand what this really id. Honestly, I really don't understand what you are really trying to do. What I think is that you are just sharing your stream about using scripts that are free or you are giving scripts for free and providing the link of the steam for people to see the settings of the script.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: There is nothing in this thread but OP wants you to join his group. The title is misleading people and those who wish to actually own the script will be interested to check the thread. This thread will soon be deleted. You can report this thread as spam actually.

comments.author: casabitcoin
comments.body: Here's a direct link to the free script used in the stream, https://pastebin.com/5MsSgYDXCheers and good luck! Johnny

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: nakamura12 on December 24, 2022, 06:46:55 PMAre you giving out a script for free to use in gambling?The script is free to base on the op as well as the title. On the title, OP has mentioned "LIVE Christmas Gambling Stream with DiceBot and Script for Free! " So, it is clear that the script is free. But I am confused about whether it will work or not. And I am confused about either it is verified in several ways or not.

comments.author: Piesel
comments.body: Quote from: casabitcoin on December 24, 2022, 07:22:43 PMHere's a direct link to the free script used in the stream, https://pastebin.com/5MsSgYDXCheers and good luck! Johnny Not many will buy in to your not and script because there is no guarantee that success in the outcome and even though this may look like a good bot for the season, I don't know how verified their service is.It was easier to trust a reputable member than just a random newbie, who claims free live streaming and bots but ops did not mention the site the script is verified on.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Nice stream, I'm watching it and looks like the bot is really printing, let me share a screen shot.But since 1 XRP is $0.35 it's not really exiting to see the profit. I mean, if you want to do some low rolls better un clam in Just-Dice and martingale starting from 0.00000001 clams. At least that way the stream can be there for 24h with less than $1 I'm not sure how much you want to win or what's the goal to stop, but if you can get an x1000 of your original balance, that would be nice.

comments.author: minime0105
comments.body: Quote from: nakamura12 on December 24, 2022, 06:46:55 PMI thought this some something else like a christmas bonus.  Even my narrative went to that particular side, but i did not understand the manner op is sharing it's streams link. So i believe that if it's Christmas it would being a bonus as the case maybe,but nevertheless, i think the concept is not bad one of sharing it link for streaming, but it's not supposed be use the name of Christmas the way I'm seeing.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: Piesel on December 24, 2022, 08:11:17 PMNot many will buy in to your not and script because there is no guarantee that success in the outcome and even though this may look like a good bot for the season, I don't know how verified their service is.It was easier to trust a reputable member than just a random newbie, who claims free live streaming and bots but ops did not mention the site the script is verified on.Using bot is not about the outcome but using it to automatically gamble according to what you set it to and yet many people think that it will change the outcome but the truth is it will never change at all. That's why I don't believe such thing will make you rich. It is all about making your bet automatic base on what you set it to. Reputation is also important if you are going to share a scripts that you yourself make.Quote from: shasan on December 24, 2022, 07:57:08 PMThe script is free to base on the op as well as the title. On the title, OP has mentioned "LIVE Christmas Gambling Stream with DiceBot and Script for Free! " So, it is clear that the script is free. But I am confused about whether it will work or not. And I am confused about either it is verified in several ways or not. Let's just assumed op wants to share the stream and the script that is used.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: I watched the stream and I see that in 45 minutes with the help of an existing and distributed OP script, he managed to earn 5.3 XRP or $ 1.85, it's clear that this is just a demonstration of the capabilities of the script for dice, but it would be more interesting to see something more impressive

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Just a question: had a look at the pastebin file and noticed you mentioned sites closed for years now (bit-exo and yolo) so guess you are using this script since many years : did it historically bring you nice profit? Any track for them if you wanna share?
